entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: SW 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
